title: Dazzle Volume 10
description: Rahzel goes back to school, where she faces Clarissa for the first time since her last adventures. Can they continue to be close after all that Rahzel has been through? Meanwhile, Rahzel is cast in the school play, but during the final performance, she spots a special person in the audience from her past, and hes not at all pleased with Rahzel's behavior.
author: Minari Endoh
